Replies.Author: Gene
Replies.Content:
Dude, don’t sweat it. I just felt like I _had_ to make some post explaining the banner or people would inevitably start talking about it in other people’s posts. Just threw it together and it doesn’t really matter much anyway since its not like 20 people are posting full novels each day. Post content as it becomes available, as I always (never) say!

\>Toyosaki Aki-san as Ibuki Suika

lol awesome
